column5: Just an FYI there has been lengthy discussions here about Seafoam and the price. so today i called around for prices on it. it started out at $15.01and the most common price was $11.95. i then called a place called "Warden Automotive", its on midland ave here in Scarborough.  the price they told me was $6.59ea so i went in to pick up 4 cans. yup the price is $6.59ea
thanks for thinking of me and getting me one...
when are we meeting up again? im heading up to the hut tomorrow with daniel and coming home sunday.
Two weeks ago CT had it for $9.59; bought 2 cans
Make sure it's the right seafoam for your application. There a couple of different ones and they vary in price.
yes , you are correct solopaddler. the one i bought was the auto,marine, added it to my van and tank for the auger.
Great, that secret is out. Lol.
thats a great price it cost's more the states it's worth it magic in a bottle
Smoking Price on a great product. I thought Warden Automotive was Wholesale only. I guess they are now selling to the public as well now.
I have never tried it, what is it used for?
The way you guys use Seafoam you could wash out the cans and fill them with BEER and then take them on the ice with you....  Is there a law against drinking Seafoam on the ice...
